name: APOLLO__PEOPLE_SEARCH
description: Search for people in Apollo's database of 210M+ contacts using demographic and professional filters

q_keywords.description: Search keywords for job titles, skills, or other profile information

person_titles.description: Array of job titles to filter by

organization_names.description: Array of company names to filter by

person_locations.description: Array of locations to filter by (city, state, country)

organization_locations.description: Array of company locations to filter by

organization_industry_tag_ids.description: Array of industry IDs to filter companies by

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 100, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__ORGANIZATION_SEARCH
description: Search for companies in Apollo's database of 35M+ organizations using various filters

q_organization_name.description: Organization name keywords to search for

organization_locations.description: Array of locations to filter by (city, state, country)

organization_industry_tag_ids.description: Array of industry IDs to filter by

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 100, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__PEOPLE_ENRICHMENT
description: Enrich person data with additional contact information and details

hashed_email.description: SHA256 hash of the person's email

organization_name.description: Name of the person's current organization

linkedin_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the person

reveal_phone_number.description: Whether to reveal phone number (requires webhook_url)

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL (required if reveal_phone_number is true)

name: APOLLO__BULK_PEOPLE_ENRICHMENT
description: Use to enrich multiple person profiles simultaneously with comprehensive data from Apollo's database

body.description: Array of people for bulk enrichment

people.description: Array of people objects to enrich (max 10)

reveal_phone_numbers.description: Whether to reveal phone numbers (requires webhook_url)

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL (required if reveal_phone_numbers is true)

name: APOLLO__ORGANIZATION_ENRICHMENT
description: Enrich organization data with additional company information and details

name: APOLLO__BULK_ORGANIZATION_ENRICHMENT
description: Enriches data for up to 10 organizations simultaneously by providing a list of their base company domains

body.description: Array of organization domains for bulk enrichment

domains.description: Array of base company domains (max 10, e.g., 'apollo.io', not 'www.apollo.io')

name: APOLLO__CREATE_CONTACT
description: Create a new contact in Apollo CRM

label_names.description: Array of label names to assign to the contact

account_id.description: Account ID to link to an organization

contact_stage_id.description: Contact stage ID for sales stage

name: APOLLO__SEARCH_CONTACTS
description: Search for existing contacts in Apollo CRM

q_keywords.description: Keywords to search for in contact information

contact_stage_ids.description: Array of contact stage IDs to filter by

contact_owner_ids.description: Array of contact owner user IDs to filter by

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 200, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__CREATE_ACCOUNT
description: Create a new account in Apollo CRM

label_names.description: Array of label names to assign to the account

owner_id.description: Owner user ID (must be valid existing ID)

account_stage_id.description: Account stage ID (must be valid existing ID)

name: APOLLO__SEARCH_ACCOUNTS
description: Search for existing accounts in Apollo CRM

q_keywords.description: Keywords to search for in account information

account_stage_ids.description: Array of account stage IDs to filter by

account_owner_ids.description: Array of account owner user IDs to filter by

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 200, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__BULK_UPDATE_ACCOUNT_STAGE
description: Bulk updates the stage for specified existing Apollo.io accounts, moving them to a valid new account stage

account_ids.description: Array of account IDs to update

account_stage_id.description: New account stage ID (must be valid existing stage ID)

name: APOLLO__LIST_ACCOUNT_STAGES
description: Retrieves all available Apollo.io account stages, each including its unique ID and name

name: APOLLO__LIST_CONTACT_STAGES
description: Retrieves all available contact stages from an Apollo account, including their unique IDs and names

name: APOLLO__CREATE_DEAL
description: Creates a new sales opportunity (deal) in Apollo.io; all provided IDs must be valid existing Apollo identifiers

owner_id.description: Owner user ID (must be valid existing ID)

account_id.description: Account ID (must be valid existing ID)

opportunity_stage_id.description: Opportunity stage ID (must be valid existing ID)

name: APOLLO__LIST_DEALS
description: Retrieves a list of deals from Apollo, using Apollo's default sort order if 'sort by field' is omitted

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 200, default: 25)

sort_by_field.description: Field to sort by (optional, uses Apollo's default if omitted)

sort_ascending.description: Sort order (true for ascending, false for descending)

name: APOLLO__OPPORTUNITY_STAGES
description: Retrieves all configured opportunity (deal) stages from the Apollo.io account

name: APOLLO__CREATE_TASK
description: Creates a distinct Apollo.io task for each contact ID in contact IDs, assigning them to user ID; not for free plan users and repeated calls create duplicate tasks

contact_ids.description: Array of contact IDs to create tasks for

user_id.description: User ID to assign the tasks to

name: APOLLO__ADD_CONTACTS_TO_SEQUENCE
description: Adds contacts to a specified Apollo email sequence by initiating an asynchronous background job and returning its details

contact_ids.description: Array of contact IDs to add to the sequence

send_email_from_email_account_id.description: Email account ID to send from

name: APOLLO__SEARCH_SEQUENCES
description: Search for email sequences in Apollo

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 200, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__ORGANIZATION_JOB_POSTINGS
description: Retrieves paginated job postings for a specified organization by its ID, optionally filtering by domain; ensure organization ID is a valid identifier

organization_id.description: Organization ID (required, must be valid identifier)

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 100, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__LABELS
description: Retrieves all labels from Apollo.io, used for organizing contacts and accounts

name: APOLLO__TYPED_CUSTOM_FIELDS
description: Retrieves all typed custom field definitions available in the Apollo.io instance, detailing their types and configurations

name: APOLLO__LIST_EMAIL_ACCOUNTS
description: Retrieves all email accounts and their details for the authenticated user; takes no parameters

name: APOLLO__USERS
description: Retrieves a list of all users (teammates) associated with the Apollo account, supporting pagination via page and per page parameters

per_page.description: Number of results per page (max 200, default: 25)

name: APOLLO__API_USAGE_STATS
description: View API usage statistics and credit consumption

start_date.description: Start date for usage stats (YYYY-MM-DD format)

end_date.description: End date for usage stats (YYYY-MM-DD format)
